Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the Current Model: Structure: Sequence: Create_Purchase_Requisition -> Approve_Purchase_Requisition Parallel AND: Create_Purchase_Order Receive_Goods Receive_Invoice Match_Invoice_to_PO Pay_Invoice Issues: The parallel block implies that activities like Pay_Invoice Create_PO Receive_Goods etc can happen in any order This violates the inherent logic of procurement

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: You cannot receive goods Receive_Goods before creating the order Create_PO You cannot match an invoice Match_Invoice_to_PO before receiving the invoice Receive_Invoice or receiving goods Match depends on Receive_Invoice Receive_Goods and Create_PO You cannot pay the invoice Pay_Invoice before matching it Match_Invoice_to_PO

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Define the Correct Logic Domain Rules: Step 1 Create_Purchase_Requisition first Step 2 Approve_Purchase_Requisition after creation Step 3 Create_Purchase_Order after approval Standard Procure-to-Pay Logic: 1 Create Req 2 Approve Req 3 Create PO 4 Receive Goods AND Receive Invoice 5 Match Invoice 6 Pay Invoice 7 Close Case

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Receive Goods and Receive Invoice can happen in parallel as they are independent until match Prompt lists them as 4 then 5 suggesting sequence but domain allows swap

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Model as Sequence of all 8 steps to match numbered list Or Seq Req Approve PO Parallel Goods Invoice Match Pay Close to capture concurrency

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Prompt says enforce sequence and structure only allows normal order replace parallel blocks with sequences Numbered list is linear 1 to 8 so pure sequence fixes underfitting and prevents unwanted behavior like paying before receiving

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Self-Correction: Pure sequence is most faithful to prompts standard logic list Reconsider parallel for Goods Invoice but prompts list orders 4 Goods then 5 Invoice so sequence is safest Final decision: full Sequence as it matches 1-8 exactly

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Simplest fix is full SEQUENCE operator for all activities as it robustly enforces dependencies and aligns with prompts explicit standard logic list
